meanings.definition: The collective community of blogs on the internet.
meanings.sent1: Many people contribute to various blogospheres online.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy exploring different blogospheres to read diverse opinions.
meanings.sent3: The blogospheres seemed to have a party last night with all the new posts.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a vast blogospheres, each thought a separate blog post.
meanings.sent5: Navigating through the blogospheres felt like diving into a sea of information.

meanings.definition: The interconnected network of blogs and bloggers.
meanings.sent1: The blogospheres share information and ideas across the web.
meanings.sent2: It's fascinating to see how blogospheres connect people from different countries.
meanings.sent3: The blogospheres were buzzing with excitement after the big blogging event.
meanings.sent4: In the vast blogospheres of the internet, every blog is a star in the sky.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the blogospheres is like entering a digital realm of creativity and knowledge.
